alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County San Gabriel Valley; Ojai Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 14 at 9:09PM PST until November 16 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM TUESDAY TO 7 PM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph expected, except 20 to 30 mph with isolated gusts of 40 to 50 mph in the foothills. * WHERE...Ojai Valley and Los Angeles County San Gabriel Valley. * WHEN...From 10 PM Tuesday to 7 PM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County San Gabriel Valley; Ojai Valley
